location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Petrol Stores at Shagha and Masira Islands

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 133 x 133mmMaterials: black and white photograph

mods.abstract: A photograph showing Shagha Island and part of Masira Island. The photograph is part of a secret letter sent by Richard Ernest Saul, Group Captain, Commanding Squadron, Royal Air Force, Basra to Air Headquarters, Iraq Command, and it is dated 30 December 1933. The subject of the letter is 'Refuelling Arrangements- Masira Island'.
